ProjectTitle: Wire arc additive manufactured (WAAM) steel components for structural applications.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/07/2022
Are you collecting any metadata with your measurements? Are there disciplinary repositories in your field? These also add metadata to the data and reading their submission guidelines may help you to decide which metadata to collect along with your experiments. For data for which there is no domain specific repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
label: good with suggestions
